Text: is there a copy of this anywhere with eng.subs h/c on non eng.parts

The only version that I could find with embedded subtitles for the non-English speaking dialogue is:

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7303197/Intruders_2011_720p_BluRay_x264_DTS_vice

The video file is in a .mkv format. However, you can easily mux that into a .mp4 format using MKVMerge. This will allow you to remove the other content from the .mkv container. If you are unfamiliar with MKVMerge, there are plenty of tutorials online.
